description: Map genes, targets, diseases, herbs, and ingredients within the HERB database. Resolve gene symbols and disease names to HERB IDs, then surface the most significant herb and ingredient associations. Speed up pharmacology and TCM research with quick, curated lookups.

capabilities.name: search_gene_symbol
capabilities.description: Find HERB target IDs for a gene symbol or alias.

capabilities.name: target_to_herbs
capabilities.description: Retrieve herbs associated with a HERB target ID.

capabilities.name: target_to_ingredients
capabilities.description: Retrieve ingredients associated with a HERB target ID.

capabilities.name: search_disease
capabilities.description: Look up HERB disease IDs by name or identifier.

capabilities.name: disease_to_herbs
capabilities.description: Retrieve herbs associated with a HERB disease ID.

capabilities.name: disease_detail
capabilities.description: Fetch normalized Herb API 2.0 association tables for a HERB disease ID.

capabilities.name: gene_to_herbs
capabilities.description: Shortcut that finds target IDs for a gene symbol and returns associated herbs.

capabilities.name: gene_to_ingredients
capabilities.description: Shortcut that finds target IDs for a gene symbol and returns associated ingredients.

capabilities.name: disease_name_to_herbs
capabilities.description: Shortcut that resolves disease names to HERB IDs and returns associated herbs.
